divs: Sighting DetailsOutside on my cell phone talking, it was dark outside, about 7:45 PM. I looked up to the sky and seen a glowing ball object going across the sky above the clouds, sky was only partially covered by clouds. The object was going extremely fast, seen it for maybe 2 seconds, it was going so fast. It was heading in the south direction. Thought I heard a buzzing noise to, not 100% sure on that.
Summary: Fireball over partly cloudy night going extremely fast
trends: There have been no other sightings in Altavista
This sighting has never been favorited.
